'''Extravagant Slumber''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Rose Custard]] with [[Layla]]. The [[recipe]] for Rose Custard is obtainable from [[Enteka]] in [[Puspa Café]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Extravagant Slumber restores '''26'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''570''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
